select u.id id, u.`name` name, u.login_name loginName, ( select case when COUNT(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end from relation_role_user rru where rru.role_id = #{roleId} and rru.user_id = u.id ) as isAssign from core_user u where u.is_deleted = 0 and u.is_enabled = 1
and u.name like '%${name}%'
